name: Analytics
description: A jQuery plugin for Google Analytics Events.
use: ### Basic Track click events in Google Analytics by attaching a properly formed data attribute to any element. The data attribute should define at least the required values, category and action. Values should be comma separated: ```markup ``` ### Advanced Fire custom events by passing the event values directly to Analytics: ```javascript $.analytics(category, action [, label] [, value]); ``` Learn more about Event Tracking with Universal Analytics.
